DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare different skin closure material transobturator suburethral sling procedure . Currently investigator use monocryl suture material standard skin closure . This material anecdotally show irritate patient type surgery . Our study compare monocryl suture material vicryl ( polyglactin 910 ) dermabond ( 2-octyl cyanoacrylate ) skin glue . The investigator believe vicryl suture material superior comfort compare monocryl dermabond type procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Skin Incision Closure Material Transobturator Suburethral Sling Procedure
DOC.criteria: Those patient receive transobturator suburethral sling procedure . Adults ( > = 18years ) . NonEnglish speaking . Allergy monocryl , vicryl , dermabond .
